MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick Upon Tweed. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:08pm due to debris in the overhead lines and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:14pm on Sunday, 25 April 2021
